Mortar.name: Mortar
Mortar.specialMechanics: Has a minimum range (blind spot) of 4 tiles. Troops within 4 tiles cannot be targeted. Deals splash damage in a 1.5 tile radius. Ground only, cannot target air troops.

Air Sweeper.name: Air Sweeper
Air Sweeper.specialMechanics: Pushback only, deals no damage. Has a 120-degree directional arc that can be rotated by the player. Pushes back air troops within its arc. Direction can be changed in the base editor.

Hidden Tesla.name: Hidden Tesla
Hidden Tesla.specialMechanics: Invisible to attackers until triggered. Triggers when an enemy troop comes within 6 tiles or when 51% of the base is destroyed. Deals 2x damage to P.E.K.K.A units. Remains hidden on the map and does not appear until triggered.

Bomb Tower.name: Bomb Tower
Bomb Tower.specialMechanics: Explodes when destroyed, dealing death damage in a 2.75 tile radius to all nearby ground troops. The death damage increases with level.

X-Bow.name: X-Bow
X-Bow.specialMechanics: Player-selectable mode: Ground Only mode has 14 tile range and targets ground troops only. Ground & Air mode has 11.5 tile range and targets both ground and air troops. Must be loaded with Elixir to function. Fires rapid bolts at 0.128 second intervals.

Inferno Tower.name: Inferno Tower
Inferno Tower.specialMechanics: Player-selectable mode: Single Target mode locks onto one troop and ramps damage over time. DPS starts at an initial value, increases after 1.5 seconds, and reaches maximum after 5.25 seconds. Single Target mode also negates healing effects on the targeted troop. Multi Target mode fires at up to 5 targets simultaneously with constant DPS (equal to the initial single target DPS). Multi Target does not ramp damage and does not negate healing.

levels._note: Level 8+ single target stage DPS values (medium and max) are estimated based on the established damage ramp pattern from levels 1-7. The multi/initial DPS of 100 is confirmed.
Level 9 single target stage DPS values (medium and max) are estimated based on the established damage ramp pattern from levels 1-7. The multi/initial DPS of 110 is confirmed.

Eagle Artillery.name: Eagle Artillery
Eagle Artillery.attackSpeed: 3 shots per volley, 10 seconds between volleys
Eagle Artillery.specialMechanics: Activates after 200 housing space worth of troops have been deployed (150 housing space for subsequent activations after the first). Fires 3 volleys of 3 projectiles each. Has a blind spot within 7 tiles where it cannot target troops. Has a range of 50 tiles covering almost the entire map. Deals splash damage with a main impact area and a secondary shockwave area.

Scattershot.name: Scattershot
Scattershot.specialMechanics: Projectiles create a cone-shaped splash behind the target in a 90-degree arc. Troops behind the initial target take splash damage while those next to or in front remain unharmed. Can only damage ground or air per shot, not both simultaneously. Has 90 rounds of ammunition.

Spell Tower.name: Spell Tower
Spell Tower.specialMechanics: Each level unlocks a new selectable spell mode. Upgrading does not improve existing spell power, only unlocks new options. Modes: Rage (level 1), Poison (level 2), Invisibility (level 3).

Monolith.name: Monolith
Monolith.specialMechanics: Deals flat DPS plus additional damage equal to a percentage of the target's maximum hitpoints per hit. Stronger targets take proportionally more damage. Hitpoints are always multiples of 101. Projectile color changes based on target HP: dark teal for low, indigo for medium, dark purple for high.

Multi-Archer Tower.name: Multi-Archer Tower
Multi-Archer Tower.specialMechanics: Three Archers fire simultaneously at up to 3 different targets. DPS listed is per archer. Dynamic retargeting based on unit proximity.

Ricochet Cannon.name: Ricochet Cannon
Ricochet Cannon.specialMechanics: Projectile ricochets to a second target within 3.5 tiles of the initial target. Ricochet deals 70% of primary damage (30% decay per bounce).

Multi-Gear Tower.name: Multi-Gear Tower
Multi-Gear Tower.specialMechanics: Switchable between Long Range and Fast Attack modes. Created by merging geared-up Cannon and Archer Tower at level 21. The merging process cannot be undone.

Firespitter.name: Firespitter
Firespitter.specialMechanics: Fires 20 shots per burst cycle with significant scatter at distance. Covers a single general direction spanning roughly 150 degrees, can be rotated in 90-degree increments. Shots can pass through the initial target to hit enemies behind, similar to Scattershot.

Revenge Tower.name: Revenge Tower
Revenge Tower.specialMechanics: Activates in stages based on buildings destroyed: Stage 1 at 5 buildings, Stage 2 at 25 buildings, Stage 3 at 50 buildings. Stage 1 is single-target. Stage 2+ has ricochet with 40% decay per bounce (secondary = 60% of primary). Stage 3 allows two bounces (tertiary = 36% of primary). Attack speed increases with each stage.

Super Wizard Tower.name: Super Wizard Tower
Super Wizard Tower.specialMechanics: Fires chain lightning that hits the primary target then chains to up to 15 additional targets. Secondary targets take reduced damage (approximately 40% of primary).

Builder's Hut.name: Builder's Hut
Builder's Hut.specialMechanics: Defense capability unlocks at level 2 (TH14). When an enemy enters range, the hut's top springs out as a crossbow turret. The Builder inside also repairs nearby damaged buildings within 4 tiles. Level 1 has no defensive capability.
